sampleIntermediateSell(bytes[],bytes[],u.details: Sample sells of an intermediate token, i.e X->Y->X. Discovers the highest output      from the first hop calls (X->Y). Then uses the highest output (Y) as an indicator      of price for the second hop calls (Y->Z).

params.firstHopCalls: Encoded calls for price discovery of X->Y
params.secondHopCalls: Encoded calls for sampling of Y->Z
params.takerTokenAmounts: Taker amounts for the first hop X->Y

returns.intermediaryAmounts: Amounts of Y from takerTokenAmounts exchanged at the best rate
returns.intermediaryInfo: Z values for each Y and the final returnData for additional info
